tool_description: Validates and standardizes credit bureau data including credit reports, tradelines, and inquiries to ensure data quality and completeness for credit assessment.

credit_report_data.description: Raw credit bureau report data in JSON or XML format

bureau_source.description: Credit bureau source: Experian, Equifax, or TransUnion

validation_level.description: Validation strictness level: basic, standard, or comprehensive

error_messages: Invalid credit report format: Ensure data is in valid JSON or XML format matching bureau specifications.
Unsupported bureau source: Use one of [Experian, Equifax, TransUnion].
Incomplete credit data: Critical fields like SSN, tradelines, or payment history are missing.
Data validation failed: Credit report contains inconsistencies or invalid values that cannot be processed.
usage: Provide credit_report_data and bureau_source, optionally specify validation_level. The tool returns validated and standardized credit data with quality metrics.

validation_status.description: Overall validation result: passed, failed, or warning

validation_errors.description: List of validation errors or warnings found
